Doc

Implemented in class xdoclet.modules.doc.DocumentationTagsHandler.

  • Block Tags
  • Content Tags

Block Tags:

forAllNamespaces (block template)

Iterates over all template namespaces registered in /tagmappings.properties file and evaluates the body of the tag for each namespace.

Content templates:

namespace (content template)

Returns current namespace name. Use inside forAllNamespaces only.

namespaceTagsHandlerClassName (content template)

Returns current namespace tags handler class name. Use inside forAllNamespaces only.

namespaceFromClassName (content template)

Returns current namespace name from current class name.

currentNamespace (content template)

Returns current namespace. Used for tags_toc.xdt.

currentNamespaceTagsHandlerClassName (content template)

Returns current namespace tags handler class name. Used for .html files.

namespace The namespace name we lookup the handler.

currentNamespaceTagsHandlerClassNameAsDirStructure (content template)

Returns current namespace name. Use inside forAllNamespaces only.

namespace The namespace name we lookup the handler.
